name: ModAventure
description:
During your travel, after leaving home you encounter a small village that is in lacks an alchemist. Lucky for you, you already know the basic skill and is also in possession of magic to make the plants grow faster.

This game was created for the GameDevHq Community Jam#2 Dec26-Jan1st

Please keep an eye out for future updates, as we will be bringing more to the table.
